name: UtahLink
0:
”Alexa, ask Utah Link for the schedule”
”Alexa, ask utah link for come follow me”
”Alexa, ask Utah Link for the temperature”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: utah link
des:
Utah Link (https://utahlink.ml) is a web app for the community of Utah, and especially Provo. This Alexa skill enables the web app tools to be used with the voice. You can ask for the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints week's come follow me reading assignment, the latest temperature reading from a sensor located in Provo, and what church schedule it is (e.g. Sunday School/Quorums/5th Sunday....)


This is not sponsored of recognized in any way by the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter day Saints. This was not developed by the Church.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
